Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Ufo sighting in South Clermont Four Corners area.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis sighting happened in South Clermont Fl.Me and my 16 year old son were parked at the Kentucky Fried Chicken parking lot,when suddenly my 16 year old calls for my attention to look at this very bright white lights that came up behind the Walmart.At first there were 3 lights then eventually the 3 lights turned into one.This sphere lights were zig-zagging towards us.It headed across 27 towards Cagans Crossing the object stopped it went backwords stopped and it moved forward and it just continued in the path towards Cagans Crossing in a zig-zagging motion.Me and my son were fallowing what at that point had turned into one solid very bright white light.It went towards the Cagans Crossing lake,once there it hovered for 10 minutes.The bright white light started dying down until it was all gone.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Clermont
There was one other sighting in Clermont on or around October 14th 2013
